r.d: PhD is a PHP based Docbook renderer aimed to replace Docbook-XSL and various other requirements needed to build the PHP.net documentation.
r.n: - Added language support with unknownversion into phpdotnet theme. (Philip) - phpbook/phpbook-xsl/version.xml is no longer used (Hannes) - Fix PEAR bug #15967: Wrong ID passed to pearweb manualFooter() (Christian)
